Introduction
This topic contains information about SEP and how the system interacts with Veterans Benefits Administration systems through Veterans Online Application (VONAPP) Direct Connect (VDC), including
purpose of SEP
VDC interview process in SEP
, and
establishment of power of attorney (POA) through VDC/SEP
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section B - Stakeholder Enterprise Portal (SEP) Claims
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section B
